entry.title: Cry Baby Bubble Gum 6 Piece Tube - 24 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Concord Confections
Type: Candy

Sour Bubble Gum

Some like it sour, yes even in Bubble Gum! You'll be crying tears of sour joy with this Bubble Gum. This mouth puckering, cringe inducing Sour Gum comes in an assortment of 6 flavors per tube. Some of us are sweet, but there's always that one sour in the mix!

  • Gluten Free
6 Piece Tube | 24 CT BOX

entry.title: Galaxy Bubble Gum Tape 58g - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Exclusive Brands
Type: Candy
Price: 15.50

A Sweet 1990's Throwback!

2-Flavour Retro Bubblegum Tape

American Gum Candy 

In the late '90s, the bubblegum tape was a huge hit amongst kids, teens, and candy-lovers alike! We're here to bring them back in 2021, because well, why not? 

Galaxy Bubble gum tape is a super fun way to enjoy your gum! Each package holds a long roll of gum that you can pull out & tear using the perfectly made gum dispenser.

Rip off a piece and enjoy it at your convenience! This 12 pack comes with two flavours: 6 original and 6 blue raspberries.

58g  Pack | 12 Count Case

Fresh Bubble Gum Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

entry.title: Bubble Yum Jolly Rancher Blue Raspberry Gum 2.8oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hershey's
Type: Candy
Price: 18.00

Bubble Yum Jolly Rancher Blue Raspberry Gum

Jolly Rancher and Bubble Yum teams up to create this crave-worthy Blue Raspberry flavoured bubble gum. 

Bubble Yum is the original soft gum! This original brand of bubble gum has a unique motto of "blow your own bubble", represented by their excentric mascot: Floyd D. Duck.

The Blue Raspberry bubblegum flavour, is now in a pack of 12! 10 pieces of long lasting, flavourful bubble gum per pack.

entry.title: Big League Chew Bubble Gum Slammin' Strawberry - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ford Gum

Price: 18.99

"The Hall of Fame of Bubble Gum"

#1 NOSTALGIC BUBBLEGUM - Your favourite chewing gum Big League Chew, now available in Strawberry. 
GREAT TASTING FLAVOUR - Slammin Strawberry flavour is the new favourite taste for kids, teens, and adults across the country. It’s the classic Big League Chew Flavour from America’s favourite chewing gum brand.
MADE IN THE USA! - Baseball’s favourite chewing gum is and will always be made right here in the United States of America. For more than 35 years, this flavorful bubble gum has been the preferred chewing gum for all ages.
Six flavours to choose from: Outta Here Original, Wild Pitch Watermelon, Swingin Sour Apple, Ground Ball Grape, Curveball Cotton Candy and Big Rally Blue Raspberry

New Super Sour Gum

Cry Baby Nitro Sour Gum is going to make your customers cry. Cry Baby is known for their iconic Cry Baby candies but now they've taken it to a wholes new-nitro-level. entry.title: Wrigley's Big Red Gum 5 Stick Sleeves 40 Pack - 1 Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wrigley
Type: Candy
Price: 14.00

"Kiss a little longer"

Get ready to wow your mouth with the bold cinnamon flavour of Big Red gum. Since 1987, Big Red has been encouraging people everywhere to let the moment linger a little longer with their fresh cinnamon breath. Go ahead, kiss a little longer with Big Red chewing gum.
Give your customers some 'big red' flavour they'll love with the Wrigley's Big Red Stick Gum!
Filled with the very big flavour of cinnamon, Big Red Gum is sweet and spicy at the same time. 
For the ultimate in cinnamon chewing gum pleasure,  there is only one Wrigley's Big Red!
  • Wrigley's Big Red chewing gum has a bold cinnamon flavour that gives long-lasting fresh breath.
  • Every single pack contains easy-to-share, individually wrapped sticks of chewing gum.
  • Enjoy the cinnamon chewing gum with the long-lasting, fiery-hot taste.
  • "Kiss a little longer" with Wrigley's Big Red gum.
  • Package includes 40 packs containing 5 individually wrapped sticks of Wrigley's Big Red gum.

40 Count Pack
